description.en: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.ar: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.br: Este peru assado fornece +50% de Experiência e +30 de Vigor por 60 minutos. Não pode ser utilizado juntamente de Pergaminhos de Amplificação, Elixir do Leão ou Frasco do Leão.
description.cns: 这只烤火鸡提供+50%经验值和1小时的30体质。不能与ES经验加成卷轴，体质药水，强力体质药水相叠加。
description.de: Dieser gebratene Truthahn gibt +50% EXP und +30 STA für eine Stunde. Lässt sich nicht mit Scroll of Experience ES, Medicine for STA oder Medicine of Strong STA kombinieren.
description.fi: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.fil: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.fr: Cette Dinde Rôtie augmente le gain d'expérience de 50% et l'Endurance (END) de +30 pendant une heure. Les effets ne se cumulent pas avec le Parchemin Spécial d'Amplification, la Potion de Vigueur ou la Potion de Grande Vigueur.
description.id: Kalkun panggang ini memberikan +50% Exp dan +30 STA selama 1 jam. Tidak bertumpuk dengan Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion atau Flask of the Lion.
description.it: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.jp: この七面鳥の丸焼きは、1 時間 +50% Exp と +30 STA を提供します。戦神の巻物ES、体力の秘薬、強力な体力の秘薬とは重複できません。
description.kr: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.nl: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.pl: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.ru: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.sp: Este Pavo Asado otorga +50% Exp y +30 STA por 1 hora. No se acumula con Pergamino Amplificador ES, Elixir de León ni Frasco de León.
description.sw: This roasted turkey provides +50% Exp and +30 STA for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion nor Flask of the Lion.
description.th: ไก่งวงอบนี้มอบ +50% Exp และ +30 STA เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง ไม่สามารถใช้ร่วมกับ Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion หรือ Flask of the Lion
description.tw: 這隻烤火雞提供 +50% Exp 和 +30 STA，持續 1 小時。 不能與ES經驗加成卷軸、體力藥水或強效體力藥水疊加。
description.vi: Gà tây nướng này cung cấp +50% Exp và +30 STA trong 1 giờ. Không cộng dồn với Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir of the Lion hay Flask of the Lion.
